title: Manoharam Kundan Emerald and Diamond Haaram
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases the timeless art of Kundan setting, meticulously hand-placed with brilliant cut diamonds around vibrant oval-cut emeralds. The pendant features a detailed filigree design, reminiscent of traditional South Indian temple jewelry. A delicate South Sea pearl dangles gracefully, adding a touch of elegance. The necklace culminates in a classic beaded chain, providing both comfort and security.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a lasting impression. Perfect for Muhurtham and Half-Saree functions.
description: This heirloom-quality Haaram embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The exceptional quality of the diamonds and emeralds, combined with the intricate Kundan setting, ensures both brilliance and durability. A truly unique piece that will be treasured for generations. A symbol of prosperity and auspiciousness.
